title: Jenna Dewan cradles her baby bump while out with boyfriend Steve Kazee for Watch What Happens Live
text:
She has been on the promotional trail for her new book, Gracefully You.

And in New York on Thursday, Jenna Dewan was joined by boyfriend Steve Kazee for her appearance on Watch What Happens Live.

The mother-of-two looked right at home with her love, who sweetly held her hand as they walked through the streets.

Together: In New York on Thursday, Jenna Dewan, 38, was joined by boyfriend Steve Kazee, 43, for her appearance on Watch What Happens Live

Jenna looked gorgeous in a long-sleeve, orange dress complete with ruffle sleeves.

The 38-year-old kept up her autumnal look with a pair of suede ankle boots, and accessorized with multiple rings.

Steve, 43, looked LA edgy in a black T-shirt, jeans, boots and a leather jacket.

Beautiful: The actress-dancer-host looked gorgeous in a long-sleeve, orange dress complete with ruffle sleeves

The right additions: The mother-of-two kept up her autumnal look with a pair of suede ankle boots, and accessorized with multiple rings

Working hard: She has been on the promotional trail for her new book, Gracefully You

The couple were rumored to have begun dating sometime between September and October of last year, according to Cosmo.

Jenna officially filed for divorce that same month from ex-husband Channing Tatum.

The couple first met in 2005 as co-stars in Step Up and married in 2009. Jenna gave birth to daughter Everly in London in May 2013.

In step: The stunner looked right at home with her love, who sweetly held her hand as they walked through the streets

Their beginning: The couple were rumored to have begun dating sometime between September and October of last year

In her new book, Gracefully You, Jenna opened up about how her daughter would feel as she moved on with new romances.

'On top of that the pressure were my fears of moving forward. What would that look like? Dating … ? Then there was my daughter,' she began, according to Us.

'She's very shy and funny and standoffish with men. It takes her a long time to warm up to others. I predicted this child was going to be jealous of whoever else I spent my time with. How would I ever date with her blessing? My fears were going haywire.'
description: She has been on the promotional trail for her new book, Gracefully You. And Jenna Dewan was joined by boyfriend Steve Kazee for her appearance on Watch What Happens Live.
